resources.string: This activity will show user created playlists and current chartbuster Song Playlists.
This activity will show all songs listed in ascending order.
This activity will show the current playing song. A user can do several actions like pause, play, play next, play previous to a list of songs.
This activity will show a list of songs, chosen by user. This list could be a album, playlist or number of songs listed by artist.
This activity will show all songs listed by Artists.
This activity should have a RecyclerView class and ArrayList class to visually represent multiple user-created playlists and current chartbuster Song Playlists.
This activity should have a RecyclerView class and ArrayList class to visually represent multiple Albums.
This activity should have a RecyclerView class and ArrayList class to visually represent all the Songs stored in local and external storage.
This activity should contain a MediaPlayer Class to call methods like selectTrack, getTrackInfo, start, pause, and much more.
This activity should have a RecyclerView class and ArrayList class to visually represent all the songs, chosen by user.
This activity should have a RecyclerView class and ArrayList class to visually represent all songs listed by Artists.
